Package ru.nsu.ermakov.graph.core

Class AbstractGraph

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.ermakov.graph.core.AbstractGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdjacencyListGraph, AdjacencyMatrixGraph, IncidenceMatrixGraph
public abstract class AbstractGraph extends Object implements Graph
Базовый класс с общей логикой для всех реализаций графа.
